cobblemon.species.palafinhero.name: Palafin
cobblemon.species.palafinhero.desc1: As it eats the seeds stored up in its pocket-like pouches, this Pokémon is not just satisfying its constant hunger. It’s also generating electricity.
cobblemon.species.palafinhero.desc2: It carries electrically roasted seeds with it as if they’re precious treasures. No matter how much it eats, it always gets hungry again in short order.
cobblemon.species.poltchageist.name: Poltchageist
cobblemon.species.poltchageist.desc1: Trainers poltchageist trusts will be allowed to experience its distinctive flavor and aroma firsthand by sampling just a tiny bit of its green tea.
cobblemon.species.poltchageist.desc2: These Pokémon multiply by creeping into teapots and pouring themselves into leftover tea.
cobblemon.species.dipplin.name: Dipplin
cobblemon.species.dipplin.desc1: It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by pretending it’s just an apple and nothing more.
cobblemon.species.dipplin.desc2: As soon as it’s born, it burrows into an apple. Not only does the apple serve as its food source, but the flavor of the fruit determines its evolution.
cobblemon.species.sinistcha.name: Sinistcha
cobblemon.species.sinistcha.desc1: Trainers poltchageist trusts will be allowed to experience its distinctive flavor and aroma firsthand by sampling just a tiny bit of its green tea.
cobblemon.species.sinistcha.desc2: These Pokémon multiply by creeping into teapots and pouring themselves into leftover tea.
cobblemon.species.pecharunt.name: Pecharunt
cobblemon.species.ogerpon.name: Ogerpon
cobblemon.species.ogerponteal.name: Ogerpon
cobblemon.species.ogerponfire.name: Ogerpon

cobblemon.species.shayminsky.name: Shaymin
cobblemon.species.dianciemega.name: Diancie
cobblemon.species.megadiancie.name: Diancie
cobblemon.species.bisharp_override.name: Bisharp
cobblemon.species.bisharp_override.desc: Violent conflicts erupt between Bisharp and Fraxure over places where sharpening stones can be found.
cobblemon.species.deoxys.name: Deoxys
cobblemon.species.deoxys.desc1: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.deoxys.desc2: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.
cobblemon.species.deoxysattack.name: Deoxys
cobblemon.species.deoxysattack.desc1: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.deoxysattack.desc2: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.
cobblemon.species.deoxysdefense.name: Deoxys
cobblemon.species.deoxysdefense.desc1: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.deoxysdefense.desc2: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.
cobblemon.species.deoxysspeed.name: Deoxys
cobblemon.species.deoxysspeed.desc1: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.deoxysspeed.desc2: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.
cobblemon.species.giratina-origin.desc: A Pokémon banished for it's violent temperment. It gazes our world from the Distortion World.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-heart.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one is made with love.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-star.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one is shines like the stars.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-diamond.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one is inspired by diamond shapes.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-debutante.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one is inspired by upper-class dresses.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-matron.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one is inspired by Matrons.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-dandy.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one has a dandy look to it.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-lareine.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one makes it look like a Queen.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-kabuki.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one is inspired by Kabuki artists.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-pharaoh.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one is inspired by pharaohs.
The flower it's holding can no longer be found blooming anywhere. It's also thought to contain terrifying power. Terrifying energy is concealed within its ominous flower, but Floette still swings it about innocently.
cobblemon.species.ogerpon-tealtera.desc: This Pokémon's type changes based on which mask it's wearing. It confounds its enemies with nimble movements and kicks.
cobblemon.species.ogerpon-wellspringtera: This form excels in both attack and defense. It ceaselessly unleashes moves like a spring gushes water.
cobblemon.species.ogerpon-hearthflameter: This form is the most aggressive, bombarding enemies with the intensity of flames blazing within a hearth.
cobblemon.species.ogerpon-cornerstoneter: This form has excellent defenses, absorbing impacts solidly like the cornerstones that support houses.
